name: nonabsorbable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A nonabsorbable substance cannot be absorbed, especially by the body: a nonabsorbable antibacterial agent Close the wound with a non-absorbable nylon suture. Related word
absorb
More examplesFewer examplesLacerations are closed in two layers and nonabsorbable sutures are removed after 3-4 days.Administer non-absorbable oral antimicrobial agents on the day before operation.Soybeans, broccoli, and cabbage contain a nonabsorbable complex carbohydrate that may be broken down into carbon dioxide, hydrogen, and methane by colonic bacteria.
